summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for Jeffrey Epstein's account at Deutsche Bank for January 2015. It details various debits and credits, including preauthorized payments and checks, as well as the ending balance for the account at the end of the month.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the account holder for the financial transactions detailed in the document.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

locations: 6100 Red 14ook Quarter, St. Thomas 00802, United States
keyFacts: The document summarizes account transactions for Jeffrey Epstein's account at Deutsche Bank for January 2015.
The ending balance as of January 31, 2015, was $226,191.23.
The account had various debits including preauthorized payments to ADP for fees and taxes.
A significant credit of $200,000 was transferred into the account on January 9, 2015.
Amanda Kirby is listed as a contact for inquiries related to the account.
